info.title: Workout Match
info.description: Workout Match is an API for creating and managing customized exercises and workouts. With this API, you can create exercises with sets, reps, and exercise classification (type), as well as group them into workouts that can have a defined difficulty level. Additionally, Workout Match also offers the ability to search for exercises and workouts from other users and copy them to your own account, which is especially useful for those looking for new workout ideas and variations.

post.description: Route to request a temporary password. The password is sent to the user's email, witch is only valid for 15 min.
Route to change password from temporary password.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: Optional. Pass 'user = true' to get the logged user information.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Pass an 'id' to get a thirdparty user information.

get.description: Route to get user iformation by 'id'.

put.description: Route to update the registered user.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: Optional. Pass 'user = true' to get the logged user exercises.

get.description: Route to get all users exercises registered. Exercises copied by an user not appear in this request.
Route to get an exercise by id.

put.description: Route to update an exercise by id.

delete.description: Route to delete an exercise by id.

value.message: The exercise was deleted with success.

post.description: Route to copy an exercise. It can be the user's own or another user's.

201.description: The request was successful. The exercise was created.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: Optional. Pass 'user = true' to get the logged user workouts.

get.description: Route to get all users workouts registered. Workout created by user not appear in this request.

201.description: The request was successful. The workout was created.

get.description: Route to get an workout by id.

put.description: Route to update an workout by Id. It is possible to add or remove exercises, including the id in the exercises array or removing the id.

value.message: The workout was deleted with success.

post.description: Route to copy an workout. It can be the user's own or another user's.

200-forget-password.description: A message indicating that the email with the temporary password has been sent.

200-change-password.description: A message indicating the password was successfully changed.

401-error1.description: To create a workout is required have exercises.

401-error2.description: Is required at least one exercise.

401-error3.description: There are no copied exercises in your request body.
